DOC.brief_summary: This extension study is considered to allow patients being treated with EC-MPS to collect further information on the long-term safety of this drug.
DOC.brief_title: Extension Study of Enteric-coated Mycophenolate Sodium in Combination With Full Dose or Reduced Dose Cyclosporine Microemulsion in Patients With de Novo Kidney Transplants
DOC.criteria: Inclusion/ Exclusion criteria All patients who completed study CERL080A2405DE01 and who are willing to continue treatment with ECMPS. Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply.
